alert.note: Alert for Ohio (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 26 at 6:40PM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Ohio County through 615 PM CDT... At 540 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Hartford, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Hartford around 550 PM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
